title: Watch hours of smart docs and TV shows with a Curiosity Stream lifetime subscription for just $179.97.
content:
Macworld

Streaming your favorite binge TV show or classic movies is always entertaining, but if you’re looking for more depth in your content, consider Curiosity Stream.

Created by Discovery Communications founder John Hendricks, Curiosity Stream is tailored to knowledge-hungry viewers bored with the mindlessness of typical streaming platforms and seeking one-of-a-kind, engaging, and educational content. Now, lifetime access is only $179.97 (reg. $399) through March 3.

With a lifetime subscription, members can access Curiosity Stream’s thousands of unique documentaries and docu-series on topics like history, space, art, and nature. Check out titles like Engineering the Future, Polar Bears, The History of Home, and much more, and stream content in HD and 4K on your favorite devices. The platform’s content is so engaging that Curiosity Stream even won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Graphic Design & Art Direction.

You can also download Curiosity Stream’s content to your device to watch offline and use the platform’s search tools to find your next favorite documentary or series. And with regular additions to their library, you won’t run out of new things to watch.

Learn something new every time you stream. 

Grab a lifetime subscription to the Curiosity Stream Standard Plan for just $179.97, the best price online, through March 3 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.
